data.actual_result: you see the channel invite leads to, can view the memberlist but don't see any messages
data.expected_result: The "you find yourself in a strange place, you don't have access to any text channels or there are none on this server

data.steps_to_repro: - take reading permissions from everyone via server config (alternatively set it manually on every channel) - have someone without roles verify the screen they see
